WorkItem.Description:
A .NET visual magnifier control, that uses the Magnification API, with two properties, WindowHandle and ZoomFactor.
The ZoomFactor magnifies the window specified by WindowHandle in the control.
The magnified display area is fully usable accepting all mouse and keyboard activity.
The window specified by WinddowHandle need not be otherwise viewable on the display screen.
